name: Enel
text: Once Per Turn: If this character were to be removed from the field, you may trash the top card of your life instead. If character [Monkey D. Luffy] is on the field, this effect may not be activated.

effect.text: If this character were to be removed from the field, you may trash the top card of your life instead. If character [Monkey D. Luffy] is on the field, this effect may not be activated.
conditions: character [Monkey D. Luffy] is on the field
